column4: in ubuntu 10.10 how can i make ubuntu show keyboard layout in panel?
should be displayed automatically once you add more languages
there is some shitty keyboard icon displayed instead of 3 letter abv
are you using default icon theme?
can you provide a screen shot?
did you add additional languages in System -> Preferences -> Keyboard -> Layouts?
question rephrased, how can i make screenshot?
press Print Screen on your keyboard or Application -> Accessories -> Take Screenshot
you mean that other thing with little letter image?
indicator is missing, try reseting panel and then see if it comes back
right click on workspace switched in the bottom right... preferences and then change the number
